name: Bravest Warrior - Beginner's Circle Jam #4 Submission
name_original: Bravest Warrior - Beginner's Circle Jam #4 Submission
description:
Submission for the Beginner's Circle Jam #4 - Theme: Game Show.

You play as a contestant in the fictional Game Show "Bravest Warrior".  Battle and puzzle your way through a maze and find the 4 hidden crystals to be declared winner of the show.
